page.title: 13Education
page.content: Most children of primary school age attend Ashton C.P. School or Manley C.P. School.A few children attend private school. The private school could be Abbey Gate or The Firs, both in Chester.At secondary level (11+) most children go to Helsby High. The private secondary schools are Queens, Kings or Abbey Gate.Over 90% of those questioned approved of school uniform at primary and secondary level.Only 1 person felt that the school day should be lengthened.Asked if they approved of corporal punishment in schools: at primary school level 60% said yes, 40% said no; and, at secondary level 94% said yes and 6% said no.When asked what children should learn at primary school people listed reading, writing and arithmetic.
